tasks.task: Operate solar-powered water pumping system for irrigation
subtasks: Manually lift water using rope, pulley, and tanker-based implements
Connect solar panel to power the water pump
Direct water from pump into tanker
Water vegetables using pumped water
Store water from winter season in tanker
Interpret wetting front detector to determine irrigation duration
Monitor soil moisture status to schedule watering

tasks.task: Maintain local irrigation tools
subtasks: Assemble components for SSI innovations
Repair and maintain solar pumps and other irrigation tools

tasks.task: Increase agricultural yields through proper irrigation practices
subtasks: Adjust watering frequency based on seasonal changes
Implement three harvests per year for maize
Recommend solar irrigation technology to other farmers

tasks.task: Conserve water through efficient irrigation methods
subtasks: Save water by using pumped water instead of manual methods
Store excess water in tankers for later use
